title: Ugly Wives, Me Time Spot, Nicknames, Vacation Plane and more.
itunes:title: Ugly Wives, Me Time Spot, Nicknames, Vacation Plane and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  No matter what, always take the time to be full of IT.  The CLO had a woman write in that is married and completely bare for someone else.  Comedy Roulette made its return and the focus was ugly wives.  A certain action requires two hands and the crew was being mean to Tommy about it.  Bitterman is here to give us the nicknames people went by.  Would You Rather for today had a genius and a con man as choices.  Where in the house is your favorite hiding spot to decompress?  30,000 feet in the air for more than a day at a time with a machine at the helm.  Cool or nah?  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve points out the importance your health and your time.  Without them you are in trouble.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
